name: netgoat
description: NetGoat is an intentionally vulnerable application designed for learning and testing web app security issues. It runs with a simple web UI and offers challenges and exercises for security training.
features: Vulnerability challenges: Practice exploiting common web security flaws in a safe environment.
OWASP coverage: Learn about vulnerabilities from the OWASP Top 10 including injection and XSS.
Guided exercises: Step-by-step lessons explain vulnerabilities and how to identify them.
Hands-on practice: Test security tools and techniques against realistic vulnerable applications.
Safe testing environment: Isolated sandbox prevents accidental damage to production systems.
Multiple difficulty levels: Progress from beginner to advanced security concepts at your own pace.
Detailed explanations: Understand why vulnerabilities exist and how to prevent them in real applications.
Security tool integration: Practice using scanners, proxies, and other security testing tools.
Code examples: View vulnerable code to understand root causes and learn secure coding practices.
Reset functionality: Restore application state to retry challenges and experiments.
Educational focus: Designed for security training, certification prep, and skill development.
Docker deployment: Quick setup with containerized environment for consistent testing experience.
